column4: Is the nonfree macromedia flash plugin available through synamptic or do I have to get it from adobe?
I tried searching for it but the only one I can find is the opensource one
it's  flash-nonfree or something like that
you need to change the perms for the folder.
I know how to use the command
are the other users in the group that the folder is set to?
are the folders that contain the folder set to the right group/perms?
you were wrong sir.  I had to log each user out and log back in for the changes to take effect.
how are you accessing the folder?
you shouldn't need to logout to do it.
I'm just telling it that is what fixed it.  In fact i'm sitting on the last user account (has not been logged out yet) and he can not enter the folder
after a quick relog he can now cd to the directory just fine.
